metadata.title: CVE-2018-6315 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The outputSWF_TEXT_RECORD function (util/outputscript.c) in libming through0.4.8 is vulnerable to an integer overflow and resultant out-of-boundsread, which may allow attackers to cause a denial of service or unspecifiedother impact via a crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
